alert.note: Alert for Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued February 24 at 7:20PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH 10 PM TONIGHT... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from heavy rainfall. WHERE...Tutuila and Aunu`u WHEN...Through 10 pm tonight, SST IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions, such as low visibility and gusty winds during heavy downpours. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rainfall will also cause landslide and/or mudslides along steep slopes as grounds have been saturated by recent rainfall. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 720 PO ASO TOFI FEPUARI 24 2022 ...UA IAI LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 10 i le po nei... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai timuga mamafa. NOFOAGA...Tutuila ma Aunu`u TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 10 i le po nei AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala, ae maise lava taimi e mamafa ai timuga aua o le a fa`aitiitia le vaai mamafa ma agi fa`ata`uta`u ai fo`i le savili. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...Ona o timuga i aso ua mavae ma timuga o lo`o iai nei, ua tele le avanoa e mafai ona tutupu ai sologa mai mauga fa`apea nofoaga a`afia gofie ona o le susu o le eleele ua iai nei. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.
